DoClick.description:
DCOLORPALETTE [Client] 

[table] clr
  The new color via the Color structure

[Panel] btn
  The DColorButton that was pressed.

OnRightClickButton.description:
DCOLORPALETTE [Client] 

[Panel] pnl
  The DColorButton that was pressed.

OnValueChanged.description:
DCOLORPALETTE [Client] Called when the color is changed after clicking a new value.

[table] newcol
  The new color of the DColorPalette

SaveColor.description:
DCOLORPALETTE [Client] 

[Panel] btn
  The button to save the color of. Used to get the ID of the button.

[table] clr
  The color to save to this button's index

SetButtonSize.description:
DCOLORPALETTE [Client] 

[number] size
  Sets the new size

SetColorButtons.description:
DCOLORPALETTE [Client] 

[table] tab
  A number indexed table where each value is a Color structure

SetConVarA.description:
DCOLORPALETTE [Client] 

[string] convar
  The ConVar name for the alpha channel of the color

SetConVarB.description:
DCOLORPALETTE [Client] 

[string] convar
  The ConVar name for the blue channel of the color

SetConVarG.description:
DCOLORPALETTE [Client] 

[string] convar
  The ConVar name for the green channel of the color

SetConVarR.description:
DCOLORPALETTE [Client] 

[string] convar
  The ConVar name for the red channel of the color

UpdateConVar.description:
DCOLORPALETTE [Client] 

[string] name
  The name of the console variable to set

[string] key
  The key of the 3rd argument to set the convar to

Possible values: "r", "g", "b", "a"

[table] clr
  The Color structure to retrieve the info from.
